932740.name: Super Seducer 2 - Bonus Video 1: Meeting the Right Women
932740.description:
The first seduction masterclass covers the beginnings of finding women for you. Most guys end up in bad relationships because they don't have a clear idea of what they want. Find out how to avoid this problem and hone in on the women that will be right for you.

Also included is the bonus "33 questions" that are scientifically proven to make people fall in love. The psychology behind this is fascinating but you will learn the practical steps to get that soulmate connection with someone who you have recently met.
932740.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
